name: SafetySearch
author: surabhya
description: A specialized MCP server that provides real-time access to FDA food safety data, specifically focused on food recalls, adverse events, and safety monitoring.

tools.name: search_recalls_by_product_description
tools.description: Searches for food recalls with detailed analysis, safety insights, and comprehensive reporting.

tools.name: search_recalls_by_product_type
tools.description: Searches for recalls by product type with detailed analysis, company trends, and safety recommendations.

tools.name: search_recalls_by_specific_product
tools.description: Checks for recalls on specific products with detailed safety information and recommendations.

tools.name: search_recalls_by_classification
tools.description: Searches for recalls by classification with detailed analysis and risk assessment.

tools.name: search_recalls_by_code_info
tools.description: Searches for recalls by code info with detailed product tracking and safety alerts.

tools.name: search_recalls_by_date
tools.description: Searches for recalls by date range with detailed timeline analysis and safety trends.

tools.name: search_adverse_events_by_product
tools.description: Searches for adverse events with detailed case analysis and safety insights.

tools.name: get_symptom_summary_for_product
tools.description: Gets detailed symptom analysis, case details, and safety insights for a specific food product.
